about_the_game:
[About the game]
All text in this game was translated by machine translation.


[Story]
Kentaro Iijima, the protagonist of this story, is a man who runs the recently popular Relax Bodywork Clinic. On the surface, Iijima is a mild-mannered young man with a gentle demeanor, but behind the scenes, he preys on women, sometimes pimping them out to the underworld. He has been doing this for years. One day, a woman visits his clinic.
Mai Miura, a mild-mannered married woman.

'Hmmm......... let's make this guy our next catch.'

Thus, Kentaro first of all begins to take action in order to take the woman in his hand.


[CHARACTER]

Name: Mai Miura
Height: 160 centimeters
Hobbies: Gardening, collecting tea leaves
Pet peeves: pushy people, insects

　A former child care worker, she retired three years ago and now lives with her husband who works for a major trading company.
She retired 3 years ago and now lives with her husband, who works for a major trading company, but he is too busy and they have not been having sex recently. She is the type of person who gets very anxious when she is worried.
She is the type of person who gets very distressed when she is worried.
She goes to the main character's clinic for a beauty massage and counseling at the suggestion of her younger sister, Ai.
She comes to the main character's clinic for beauty massage and counseling at the suggestion of her younger sister Ai. As she undergoes hypnosis, her body and mind are liberated.
and becomes more and more honest about her own desires.

Japanese voice recording （※Male characters are not recorded)


◆Game Specifications◆
Novel game that can be read by clicking.
Heroine full voice
CG mode
Scene recollection



◆Content warning◆

may not be suitable for display in the workplace.

game contains nudity or sexual content, violence, sexual assault, sex without consent, and general adult content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

short_description: This is a game in which the main character turns a frustrated married woman into a lecherous sex slave little by little. Please enjoy the process of training little by little.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
